dmca.title: Google Groups DMCA - boystation.com
dmca.body:
Andreas Kruger
Cyborg Webdesign 
Berlagestraat 17
NL-6412 ZX Heerlen

Datum: 05-Oktober-2006

Google Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support 
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway 
Mountain View, CA 94043 
USA

copyright infringements BOYSTATION"" original images

I am the publisher of BOYSTATIONT(TM), Andreas Kruger/Cyborg Webdesign/Heerlen/Netherlands/akruger@boystation.com

I hereby state that I am the only and fully legal copyright holder of the material shown in the following messages. Please remove the messages, better close the group because it's full of copyright protected material from other sites too.
Bad to see that Google has no problem with all these illegal Activities, even worth you make money with your advertisers showing up on this pages where you allow copyright abuse without any control.

Here the Google groups and group messages infringing our copyrights: http://groups.google.com/group/nice-to-look-at/msg/8e4277c2ldOd95cl http://groups.google.com/group/nice-to-look-at/msg/6363297dc4fa5908 http://groups.google.com/group/nice-to-look-at/msg/de4b6d7359ee034b http://groups.google.com/group/nice-to-look-at/msg/f430cc85b65810b1 http://groups.google.com/group/nice-to-look-at/msg/25alc8542341aad2 http://groups.google.com/group/nice-to-look-at/msg/de4b6d7359ee034b http://groups.google.com/group/nice-to-look-at/msg/ec69e3l99362551c http://groups.google.com/group/nice-to-look-at/msg/cl7521f68a9c2877 http://groups.google.com/group/nice-to-look-at/msg/0493c93fb1311542 http://groups.google.com/group/nice-to-look-at/msg/539b2ea4bdO61035 
http://groups.google.com/group/nice-to-look-at/msg/7244fb2d8b3d7a77 http://groups.google.com/group/nice-to-look-at/msg/7971359be53c9578 http://groups.google.com/group/nice-to-look-at/msg/30607acd1b720915 http://groups.google.com/group/nice-to-look-at/msg/c2f084aac3bd3lb3 
http://groups.google.com/group/nice-to-look-at/msg/b99ecfddb600ca22

http://groups.google.com/group/Solo_Bois/msg/642662dbec94989c http://groups.google.com/group/Solo_Bois/msg/39f7ed7ec2b73f70

Ich versichere nach bestem Wissen und Gewissen, da
